message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000. I believe this reflects its true worth, but I'm open to hearing your thoughts.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,000 is significantly below its value.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,500 is still a bit too steep for me. I'm willing to go up to $10,500, but that's my final offer. Can you meet me there?
